message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Thanks for offering, Alice! I'm interested but $180 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider $110?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $180 might be a bit high for you, but I was thinking more along the lines of $160. Would that be more to your liking?
I appreciate you coming down a bit, Alice.  How about we meet in the middle at $135?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $155. Would that work for you?
